entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] Install wasi-sdk on the windows image #82651
    8.0.0
  • PR/issue labeling bot isn't labeling #82643
  • STJ and Frozen collections #82642
  • Dynamic PGO - cache results in containerized scenarios? #82638
  • [7.0] Failed USB connection via port 54050, error 61, in tvOS arm64 Release AllSubsets_Mono #82637
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_sh() #82633
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_sh() #82632
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Rename IndexOfAnyValues #82622
    8.0.0
  • [wasi][icu] Add ICU sharding for wasi #82614
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Claims.Claim Value should support any data type #82613
  • The callback for the Hot Reload MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute does not invoke. #82625
  • [wasm] Perf failure with ` Compiling function #5058 failed: not enough arguments on the stack for i64.extend_i32_u (need 1, got 0) ` #82608
    8.0.0
  • NAOT publish build has a 1MB size delta between reflection free and not (+50% total size) #82607
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Path.ReplaceInvalidFileNameChars and Path.ReplaceInvalidPathChars #82606
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse(), Take 2 #82605
  • Reduce number of methods which go through data flow analysis in ILC #82603
  • The current ManagedWebSocket.IsValidCloseStatus implementation may reject certain valid status codes when it shouldn't #82602
  • LdapConnection does not handle passwords containing UTF-8 characters on Linux #82601
  • Bogus `OperationCanceledException` raised by `StreamPipeReader` read methods #82594
  • [browser][icu] Find a way to test ICU sharding on Node #82593
  • [browser][icu] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82592
  • `Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree` can use `RegDeleteTreeW` #82586
  • Latest mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:7.0-alpine reporting vulnerable dependencies on trivy scan #82584
  • ComInterfaceGenerator emits method attributed with [UnmanagedCallersOnly] and `in` `out` or `ref` parameters. #82581
    8.0.0
  • `AssemblyName` lacks override on `GetHashCode` resulting multiple values in `HashSet<AssemblyName>` #82580
  • add tests runs with Spanish (or other) locale #82579
    8.0.0

Closed

  • "ServerBusyEgress is over the account limit" failure in wasi-wasm windows Release LibraryTests_Smoke build leg #82627
  • Is the labeler bot still broken? #82650
  • dotnet EXE application doesn't work with shebang on Linux #78941
    7.0.x
  • PlatformNotSupported after system updates (Ubuntu 22.04 LTS x64) #75427
  • Garbage collector may crash when new byte[] and GC.AllocateUninitializedArray(n, true) is mixed extensively. #82548
    8.0.0
  • SqlBytes from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80259
  • CI legs failing with "Assembly 'illink' is missing dependency 'Mono.Cecil'" error #82611
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink package is broken #82597
  • Dynamically loaded DLL is missing symbols on Android and iOS #82417
    8.0.0
  • Build breaks in profiling samples #80280
    8.0.0
  • [.NET6 fix port] NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException #81022
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: RSA.GetMaxOutputSize #78175
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: unchecked variants of operator interfaces #82360
  • API Proposal : Arm TableVectorLookup and TableVectorExtension intrinsics #1277
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Perf_Convert and System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests #79615
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf<UInt64> #75910
  • Proposal: add `Undefinable*<T>` structs similar to `Nullable<T>` with alias support #77606
  • Provide a built-in way to create APM methods from a Task-based method #61729
    8.0.0
  • Representation of function pointer types in the reflection stack #11354
    8.0.0
  • Enable HTTP/3 stress on Windows #82258
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests #82537
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 2/19/2023 10:06:54 AM #82538
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] Allow basic ICU sharding in WASM app like Blazor does it + custom files #79987
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Using the Wrong Currency Negative Pattern (1 vs 0) for en-US #82178
    Future
  • Matchad Prime clipboard bugs after NET 7.0 installation #80815
  • .NET to run in WASMEdge #61791
    Future
  • gentree.h (8125) - Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.X86Base:DivRem(uint,int,int):System.ValueTuple`2[int,int]' during 'LSRA allocate' #82397
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create FrozenArray #82552
  • High memory usage in Blazor app, when built with `wasm-tools` workload installed #73949
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Error on iOS Safari - RangeError: Out of Memory #79909
  • [wasm] Determine what default value to use for `$(EmccInitialHeapSize)` #66313
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly crashes on mobile devices with low RAM #61925
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] do we need VFS #81418
    8.0.0
  • IHttpClientFactory change HttpClientHandler credentials #81594
  • [API Proposal]: Remove the DefaultValueAttribute from properties that need dynamically calculated default values in WinForms controls #81937
    Future
  • [LSRA][RyuJIT] Add support to allow either of op1 or op2 to be considered as reg optional rather than Lower fixing one of the operands as reg optional #6358
    Future
  • RyuJIT Xarch: GT_STORE_LCL_VAR(0) leads to a redundant xor if LclVar and constant 0 gets assigned different regs #6746
    Future
  • Improve handling of fixed register requirements #7966
    Future
  • [RyuJIT][CQ] LSRA: Investigate separating cross-block lclVars from intra-block lclVars #7992
    Future
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Evaluate jit-time impact of recording preferences at each kill #7998
    Future
  • Activity should have AddExceptionMethod #53641
    Future
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Improve efficiency of VarToRegMaps #8013
    Future
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Consider pre-allocating high-frequency lclVars #8019
    Future
  • Add Tests for System.Drawing.Common #22130
    Future
  • Examples where RyuJit x86 has more integer spills/reloads/movs than Jit32 #8554
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Poor CQ/RA if method parameter is used directly #9040
    Future
  • LSRA: Don't change register assignments for def/use conflicts #10196
    Future
  • HTTP3 QUIC - client over Cronet sends CertificateUnknown and closes QUIC listener #79350
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping does not work in MauiApp on iOS Device, .net 7 #80253

PullRequests

Created

  • Add CA 2021 into CodeAnalysis config #82649
    area-Meta
  • Add runtime file version to RuntimeInfo #82648
  • Update GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #82647
  • [wasm] Add a GC lock API and deprecate it #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • Replace IlcHostArch with SDK-computed value #82645
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create .devcontainer/devcontainer.json #82639
    community-contribution
  • JIT: fix finally target flags after some flow graph updates #82623
  • Fix Icon(Stream) handling of partial reads #82621
    area-System.Drawing
  • [browser][icu][libraries] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82619
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll #82618
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after downloa retry #82617
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Track down analyzer failure #82615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix SoundPlayer handling of partial reads on streams #82612
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • JIT: Unify arm64 and x64 GT_SELECT handling #82610
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
  • Intrinsically recognize Unsafe APIs in the scanner #82589
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • disable tests on Server 2022 with spanish locale #82578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Backport #82480 (fix third argument to TypedArray.fill) #82572
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] CI: For linux, run AOT smoke tests with the EAT build #82570
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove some IAsyncResult implementations from System.Net.Mail #82644
    area-System.Net
  • [wasi] provision.ps1: stop on error #82641
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi] Misc fixes #82569
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Make `TYP_SIMD32` be xarch only #82624
  • Fix host tests clean-up of test artifact parent directories #82573
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Use MarshallerHelpers method in ComInterfaceGenerator to make compiler friendly generic #82582
  • Fix handling of partial reads in SqlBytes #82620
    area-System.Data
  • Use Array.Reverse<T> in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.Reverse #82629
    area-System.Collections
  • Add cecil dependency to ILLink package #82630
    linkable-framework
  • Add a var_types_classification for simd #82616
  • Remove stale IAsyncResult implementation from tests #82609
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][debugger] Show loaded symbols on VS module window #82587
  • Fix ilc package name for linux-musl #82590
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Mono default interface methods with protected virtual class methods #82577
    community-contribution
  • Implement RSA.GetMaxOutputSize #82565
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Delete .NET SDK 6 support #82568
  • Add tests that use the host's computed RID #82574
    area-Host
  • Fix warning/error with gcc11 in PalRedhawkUnix.cpp #82596
  • Add and use public TaskToAsyncResult helper type #82557
  • Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Support symbol server on mobile devices #82555
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fixed the 3rd argument for TypedArray.fill() #82480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate jiterpreter LDELEMA1 and LDLEN from C helper to inline in traces #82576
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [browser] remove custom startup sequence of blazor #82532
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable constant folding in Tier0 #82412
  • Fix missing changes in from ProducedBy enum change #82575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable jiterpreter null check optimization for mid-method traces #82585
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update SDK to preview 1 and upgrade roslyn again #82652
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [class] DIMs in the vtable of abstract classes may be overridden #82556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • update Ubuntu 22 Helix images #82460
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2122151 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thunk page generation and mapping for iOS-like platforms #82317
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
